tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sponsorships (
    sponsorship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    club_name VARCHAR(255),
    sponsor_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    sponsorship_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE sponsorships (
   sponsorship_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   sponsor_name VARCHAR(255),
   sponsor_type VARCHAR(50),
   sponsorship_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
   club_id UUID,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
   contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   club_id UUID,
   sponsor_id UUID,
   contract_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
   contract_duration INT,
   contract_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE sponsorship_deals (
    deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    club_id INT,
    sponsor_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE advertising_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    club_id INT,
    agency_name VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    club_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE SponsorshipDeals ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    sponsor_name TEXT, 
    start_date DATE, 
    end_date DATE, 
    amount DECIMAL 
);

CREATE TABLE AdvertisingContracts ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    advertiser_name TEXT, 
    duration INT, 
    cost DECIMAL, 
    start_date DATE, 
    end_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialTransactions ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    transaction_type TEXT, 
    amount DECIMAL, 
    date DATE, 
    description TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE sponsorship_deals (
    deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    club_id INT,
    sponsor_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE advertising_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    club_id INT,
    advertiser_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    club_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);
